verses.name: Genesis 11:11
verses.text: And Shem lived after he begat Arphaxad five hundred years, and begat sons and daughters.

verses.name: Genesis 11:12
verses.text: And Arphaxad lived five and thirty years, and begat Salah:

verses.name: Genesis 11:13
verses.text: And Arphaxad lived after he begat Salah four hundred and three years, and begat sons and daughters.

verses.name: Genesis 11:14
verses.text: And Salah lived thirty years, and begat Eber:

verses.name: Genesis 11:15
verses.text: And Salah lived after he begat Eber four hundred and three years, and begat sons and daughters.

verses.name: Genesis 11:16
verses.text: And Eber lived four and thirty years, and begat Peleg:

verses.name: Genesis 11:17
verses.text: And Eber lived after he begat Peleg four hundred and thirty years, and begat sons and daughters.
